name: CHI Saint Joseph London Nurturing Children Program
description: The Nurturing Children Program at Saint Joseph London is a community outreach initiative that provides educational programs and safety initiatives for children and families in the London, Kentucky area. The program includes the Eddie Eagle GunSafe® program, which teaches children about gun safety, and other child-focused educational initiatives. The program is made possible through grants from the CommonSpirit Health Mission and Ministry Fund and is administered through the Saint Joseph London Foundation.
source: Verified from official website and foundation information
services: Eddie Eagle GunSafe® Program, Child Safety Education, Family Outreach Programs, Community Education Initiatives
eligibility: Children and families in the London, Kentucky area
notes: Program is part of the Saint Joseph London Foundation. Contact Mollie Harris for Eddie Eagle GunSafe® program inquiries. The foundation supports various community health programs throughout Kentucky including Hope for Newborns, Humankindness Havens, Total Health Roadmap, Violence Prevention, and Project Hope.
